title: "Honor Thy Mother"
description:
14-year-old Charlotte is collecting old vaping equipment and now finds herself in a bitter argument with her mom about it. - Dr. Laura: "You will show your mother respect and she will see you maturing."

Do you show your parents the respect they deserve? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
